title: Angular Primitives Component Options Schema
description: Create a reusable Angular Primitives component.

primitive.description: The name of the primitive to generate.
primitive.x-prompt: What primitive would you like to generate?

path.description: The path where the component files should be created, relative to the current workspace.
path.x-prompt: What is the path to create the component?

prefix.description: A prefix to be added to the component's selector. For example, if the prefix is `app` and the component name is `button`, the selector will be `app-button`.

componentSuffix.description: Append the specified suffix to the component name. If the component name is `Button` and the suffix is `Component`, the generated component will be named `ButtonComponent`.

fileSuffix.description: Generate component template files with the specified suffix.

exampleStyles.description: Whether example styles should be generated.
